name: shield-hire-monorepo
description: Root package to manage backend and frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently --names "BACKEND,METRO,ADMIN" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.android: concurrently --names "BACKEND,METRO,ANDROID,ADMIN" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run android:all" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.ios: concurrently --names "BACKEND,METRO,IOS,ADMIN" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run ios:build" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.stop: taskkill /F /IM node.exe /T 2>nul || echo No Node processes to kill
